Credit & Financing Guide

Credit Requirements Guide

Understand credit requirements for vehicle leasing and discover how Jose can help you get approved regardless of your current credit situation.

Credit Tiers & Opportunities

We work with all credit levels to find you the best possible terms and vehicle options

750+
Credit Score

Excellent Credit

Qualify for the most competitive lease terms and premium vehicle options.

Available Benefits:

  • Best available rates
  • Minimal down payment
  • Premium vehicle access
  • Fastest approval
650-749
Credit Score

Good Credit

Access to most vehicles with favorable terms and competitive rates.

Available Benefits:

  • Competitive rates
  • Standard terms
  • Wide vehicle selection
  • Quick approval
550-649
Credit Score

Fair Credit

Special programs available with personalized assistance from Jose.

Available Benefits:

  • Specialized programs
  • Credit improvement options
  • Flexible terms
  • Expert guidance
Under 550
Credit Score

Building Credit

Specialized solutions to help you get approved and improve your credit.

Available Benefits:

  • Credit building programs
  • Co-signer options
  • Fresh start opportunities
  • Personal consultation

Application Requirements

What you'll need to complete your lease application

Income Verification

  • Recent pay stubs
  • Tax returns (if self-employed)
  • Bank statements
  • Employment verification

Identification

  • Valid driver's license
  • Social Security card
  • Proof of residence
  • Insurance information

Credit Information

  • Credit score and report
  • Previous auto loans
  • Current debt obligations
  • Co-signer info (if applicable)

Improve Your Credit Score

Simple steps to boost your credit and qualify for better terms

Pay Bills On Time

Payment history is the most important factor affecting your credit score

Lower Credit Utilization

Keep credit card balances below 30% of available limits

Don't Close Old Accounts

Length of credit history positively impacts your score

Monitor Your Credit

Regular monitoring helps catch errors and track improvement
